skillModules.title: Mindfulness
skillModules.subtitle: The Foundation
skillModules.description: The foundation of all DBT skills - learning to observe, describe, and participate in the present moment

skillModules.title: Distress Tolerance
skillModules.subtitle: Crisis Survival
skillModules.description: Crisis survival skills and reality acceptance techniques for when you can't change the situation

skillModules.title: Emotion Regulation
skillModules.subtitle: Managing Feelings
skillModules.description: Understanding emotions and learning to change or cope with them effectively

skillModules.title: Interpersonal Effectiveness
skillModules.subtitle: Relationships
skillModules.description: Getting what you want from others while maintaining relationships and self-respect

skillModules.title: Walking the Middle Path
skillModules.subtitle: Balance
skillModules.description: Balancing acceptance and change, thinking dialectically to avoid extremes

skillModules.title: Reality Acceptance Skills
skillModules.subtitle: Advanced Acceptance
skillModules.description: Advanced skills for accepting life as it is while working toward change

learningApproaches.title: Progressive Learning
learningApproaches.description: Skills are taught progressively through practice, repetition, and real-world application. You'll start with basic techniques and build toward more complex skills as you develop mastery.

learningApproaches.title: Integrated Approach
learningApproaches.description: Each skill module builds on the others, creating a comprehensive toolkit that addresses different aspects of emotional and interpersonal challenges.
